metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000500 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Busybox contains a Missing SSL certificate validation vulnerability in The"busybox wget" applet that can result in arbitrary code execution. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via Simply download any file over HTTPSusing "busybox wget https://compromised-domain.com/important-file".

criterions.comment: busybox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
